texts.text:
CanJoinRaid: 1 or 0 (true/false) - If false, the entity will not participate in raids and will not be counted in the progress bar.
 PatrolLeader: 1 or 0 (true/false) - True if the current mob is the patrol leader.
 Patrolling: 1 or 0 (true/false) - Makes the mob assume patrol behavior.
 PatrolTarget: The coordinate that the patrol moves toward. Requires Patrolling tag set to 1 to work and at least 2 patrol members.
 X: X coordinate that the patrol moves toward.
 Y: Y coordinate that the patrol moves toward.
 Z: Z coordinate that the patrol moves toward.
 RaidId: Numeric ID of the raid that the mob currently belongs to.
 Wave: Raid wave that the mob spawned as part of.
